sentences.english: He and Wang Shuo had all the necessary contacts.

sentences.english: When the book came out, many people bought it because of the name Wang Shuo.
sentences.chinese: 當這本書一面市，許多人是衝著王朔的名子而買。

sentences.english: Wang Shou is the successful sample of writer transforming in the maket economy.

sentences.english: A large number of critics of Wang's article have followed the publication of his works.
sentences.chinese: 隨着王朔作品的大量出爐，評論者的文章也隨之而來。

sentences.english: Ms. Xu was also rumored to have dated the satirical novelist Wang Shuo.
sentences.chinese: 徐靜蕾還被傳曾與諷刺小說家王朔交往過。
